duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate a station in a catalyst process unit and certify on multiple stations.
Write end-of-shift report and participate in shift exchange and production meetings.
Participate in safety processes, rapid problem solving, and continuous improvement activities.
Ensure safety and follow all safety procedures in the immediate area.
Follow work instructions and attend all necessary meetings.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED. 1 year experience in a manufacturing/industrial or service industry environment. Bachelor's degree preferred.
